definition: drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: But the truth is there was no drunken carousing more honorable and fruitful.
sentences.chinese: 但是实际上，饮酒作乐实在是人生的一大快事。

sentences.english: Prince daily and ZhangLiHua flirting, bender.
sentences.chinese: 太子每日与张丽华打情骂俏，饮酒作乐。

sentences.english: From then on, the king of Qi gave up his bad habit of drinking and playing all night.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，齐威王改掉了整晚饮酒作乐的坏习惯。

sentences.english: They went on a binge last night and didn't get back until 3in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚他们出去饮酒作乐，直到今晨3点钟才回来。

sentences.english: They were drinking and reveling all night.
sentences.chinese: 他们整晚都在饮酒作乐。

sentences.english: Life is not all beer and skittle.
sentences.chinese: 生活并非饮酒作乐而已。

sentences.english: Anderson started out on his alcoholic binges at quite an early age.
sentences.chinese: 安德森很小就开始饮酒作乐了。

definition: lakes of wine and forests of meat (idiom); debauchery/sumptuous entertainment
as if drunk or entranced (idiom); leading a befuddled existence/in a drunken stupor
to spend one's time in drinking and pleasure (idiom); to indulge in sensual pleasures/life of debauchery
dead drunk/as drunk as a lord
